transcription.text: There are about 250,000 artefacts in the ACMI Collection, which we’ve been collecting for over 75 years – ever since ACMI was conceived as a film lending and education organisation called the State Film Centre. In the Blackmagic Media Preservation Lab, we’re digitising our film and time-based media collections, assessing physical artefacts from our videogame collection and film donations, as well as making the collection accessible onsite and online.
